objektif: Pupils will be able to listen and identify main ideas about 'Listening' correctly.
Pupils will be able to speak and communicate information regarding 'Listening' confidently.
Pupils will be able to read texts related to 'Listening' with correct pronunciation.
Pupils will be able to write sentences/paragraphs about 'Listening' neatly.
Pupils will be able to achieve the learning standards of the week through various activities.
aktiviti: Pupils listen to the teacher's explanation about 'Listening' and brainstorm related vocabulary on the whiteboard.
Pupils work in pairs to practise the dialogue related to 'Listening' while paying attention to correct intonation.
Pupils engage in a 'Think-Pair-Share' session to discuss the moral values found in the story of 'Listening'.
Pupils work in groups to create a mind map summarizing the key points of 'Listening'.
Pupils construct simple sentences using the new vocabulary learnt from the topic 'Listening'.
Pupils play a 'Guess the Word' game involving vocabulary from the topic 'Listening' using flashcards.
Pupils participate in a 'Hot Seat' activity where a selected student answers questions about 'Listening'.
Pupils recite a poem or sing a song related to 'Listening' with correct pronunciation.
Pupils participate in a 'Gallery Walk' to view and comment on other groups' work regarding 'Listening'.
Pupils read a short text about 'Listening' and answer comprehension questions in their exercise books.
